segments.text: I've been told that you are a very successful businessman abroad . I wonder how you managed to achieve such success ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , through a lot of hard work , of course .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I suppose that in a foreign country it was difficult at first , wasn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Surely it was , especially when you only knew few people and little English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean you didn't know much English then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . I only knew a few English sentences .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's incredible . Could you tell me what you did to make a start ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First , I worked as a servant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I wish you could tell me more about your experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to , but I must run to a meeting .
segments.speaker: S2
